00051   */
00052 /**
00053  * @brief Enumeration of LCD mask time.
00054  */
00055 typedef enum {
00056   LCD_MaskTime_25ns = (0x00 << 24), /*!< MCONT mask time = 25 ns                                            */
00057   LCD_MaskTime_40ns = (0x01 << 24), /*!< MCONT mask time = 40 ns                                            */
00058 } LCD_MaskTime_Enum;
00059 
00060 /**
00061  * @brief Enumeration of LCD STATIC switch.
00062  */
00063 typedef enum {
00064   LCD_StaticSwitch_Close = (0x00 << 14), /*!< STATIC switch is closed during dead time                      */
00065   LCD_StaticSwitch_Open  = (0x01 << 14), /*!< STATIC switch is open during dead time                        */
00066 } LCD_StaticSwitch_Enum;
00067 
00068 /**
00069  * @brief Enumeration of LCD MUXCOM7.
00070  */
00071 typedef enum
00072 {
00073   /*!< 57341: SEG28/COM7                                                                                    */
00074   /*!< 57352: SEG36/COM7                                                                                    */
00075   LCD_MUXCOM7_IS_COM7  = (0x00 << 11),
00076   LCD_MUXCOM7_IS_SEGx = (0x01 << 11),
00077 } LCD_MUXCOM7_Enum;
00078 
00079 /**
00080  * @brief Enumeration of LCD MUXCOM6.
00081  */
00082 typedef enum
00083 {
00084   /*!< 57341: SEG27/COM6                                                                                    */
00085   /*!< 57352: SEG35/COM6                                                                                    */
00086   LCD_MUXCOM6_IS_COM6  = (0x00 << 10),
00087   LCD_MUXCOM6_IS_SEGx = (0x01 << 10),
00088 } LCD_MUXCOM6_Enum;
00089 
00090 /**
00091  * @brief Enumeration of LCD MUXCOM5.
00092  */
00093 typedef enum
00094 {
00095   /*!< 57341: SEG26/COM5                                                                                    */
00096   /*!< 57352: SEG34/COM5                                                                                    */
00097   LCD_MUXCOM5_IS_COM5  = (0x00 << 9),
00098   LCD_MUXCOM5_IS_SEGx = (0x01 << 9),
00099 } LCD_MUXCOM5_Enum;
00100 
00101 /**
00102  * @brief Enumeration of LCD MUXCOM4.
00103  */
00104 typedef enum
00105 {
00106   /*!< 57341: SEG25/COM4                                                                                    */
00107   /*!< 57352: SEG33/COM4                                                                                    */
00108   LCD_MUXCOM4_IS_COM4  = (0x00 << 8),
00109   LCD_MUXCOM4_IS_SEGx = (0x01 << 8),
00110 } LCD_MUXCOM4_Enum;
00111 
00112 /**
00113  * @brief Enumeration of LCD waveform.
00114  */
00115 typedef enum
00116 {
00117   LCD_Type_A_Waveform = (0x00 << 7), /*!< Type A waveform                                                   */
00118   LCD_Type_B_Waveform = (0x01 << 7), /*!< Type B waveform                                                   */
00119 } LCD_Waveform_Enum;
00120 
00121 /**
00122  * @brief Enumeration of LCD bias.
00123  */
00124 typedef enum {
00125   LCD_Bias_1_4    = (0x00 << 5), /*!< 1/4 bias                                                              */
00126   LCD_Bias_1_2    = (0x01 << 5), /*!< 1/2 bias                                                              */
00127   LCD_Bias_1_3    = (0x02 << 5), /*!< 1/3 bias                                                              */
00128   LCD_Bias_Static = (0x03 << 5), /*!< Static bias                                                           */
00129 } LCD_Bias_Enum;
00130 
00131 /**
00132  * @brief Enumeration of LCD duty.
00133  */
00134 typedef enum {
00135   LCD_Duty_Static = (0x00 << 2), /*!< Static duty                                                           */
00136   LCD_Duty_1_2    = (0x01 << 2), /*!< 1/2 duty                                                              */
00137   LCD_Duty_1_3    = (0x02 << 2), /*!< 1/3 duty                                                              */
00138   LCD_Duty_1_4    = (0x03 << 2), /*!< 1/4 duty                                                              */
00139   LCD_Duty_1_6    = (0x04 << 2), /*!< 1/6 duty                                                              */
00140   LCD_Duty_1_8    = (0x05 << 2), /*!< 1/8 duty                                                              */
00141 } LCD_Duty_Enum;
00142 
00143 /**
00144  * @brief Enumeration of LCD voltage source.
00145  */
00146 typedef enum {
00147   LCD_VoltageSource_External = (0x00 << 1), /*!< External voltage source                                    */
00148   LCD_VoltageSource_Internal = (0x01 << 1), /*!< Internal voltage source                                    */
00149 } LCD_VoltageSource_Enum;
00150 
00151 /**
00152  * @brief Enumeration of LCD clock prescaler.
00153  */
00154 typedef enum {
00155   LCD_Prescaler_1     = (0x00 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 1                                               */
00156   LCD_Prescaler_2     = (0x01 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 2                                               */
00157   LCD_Prescaler_4     = (0x02 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 4                                               */
00158   LCD_Prescaler_8     = (0x03 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 8                                               */
00159   LCD_Prescaler_16    = (0x04 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 16                                              */
00160   LCD_Prescaler_32    = (0x05 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 32                                              */
00161   LCD_Prescaler_64    = (0x06 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 64                                              */
00162   LCD_Prescaler_128   = (0x07 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 128                                             */
00163   LCD_Prescaler_256   = (0x08 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 256                                             */
00164   LCD_Prescaler_512   = (0x09 << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 512                                             */
00165   LCD_Prescaler_1024  = (0x0A << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 1024                                            */
00166   LCD_Prescaler_2048  = (0x0B << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 2048                                            */
00167   LCD_Prescaler_4096  = (0x0C << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 4096                                            */
00168   LCD_Prescaler_8192  = (0x0D << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 8192                                            */
00169   LCD_Prescaler_16384 = (0x0E << 22), /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 16384                                           */
00170   LCD_Prescaler_32768 = (0x0F << 22)  /*!< CK_PS = CK_LCD / 32768                                           */
00171 } LCD_Prescaler_Enum;
00172 
00173 /**
00174  * @brief Enumeration of LCD clock divider.
00175  */
00176 typedef enum {
00177   LCD_Divider_16 = (0x00 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 16                                                   */
00178   LCD_Divider_17 = (0x01 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 17                                                   */
00179   LCD_Divider_18 = (0x02 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 18                                                   */
00180   LCD_Divider_19 = (0x03 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 19                                                   */
00181   LCD_Divider_20 = (0x04 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 20                                                   */
00182   LCD_Divider_21 = (0x05 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 21                                                   */
00183   LCD_Divider_22 = (0x06 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 22                                                   */
00184   LCD_Divider_23 = (0x07 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 23                                                   */
00185   LCD_Divider_24 = (0x08 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 24                                                   */
00186   LCD_Divider_25 = (0x09 << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 25                                                   */
00187   LCD_Divider_26 = (0x0A << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 26                                                   */
00188   LCD_Divider_27 = (0x0B << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 27                                                   */
00189   LCD_Divider_28 = (0x0C << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 28                                                   */
00190   LCD_Divider_29 = (0x0D << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 29                                                   */
00191   LCD_Divider_30 = (0x0E << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 30                                                   */
00192   LCD_Divider_31 = (0x0F << 18), /*!< CK_DIV = CK_PS / 31                                                   */
00193 } LCD_Divider_Enum;
00194 
00195 /**
00196  * @brief Enumeration of LCD blink mode.
00197  */
00198 typedef enum {
00199   LCD_BlinkMode_Off           = (0x00 << 16), /*!< Blink inactive                                           */
00200   LCD_BlinkMode_SEG0_COM0     = (0x01 << 16), /*!< SEG0 on COM0 blink                                       */
00201   LCD_BlinkMode_SEG0_AllCOM   = (0x02 << 16), /*!< SEG0 on All COM blink                                    */
00202   LCD_BlinkMode_AllSEG_AllCOM = (0x03 << 16), /*!< All SEG on All COM blink                                 */
00203 } LCD_BlinkMode_Enum;
00204 
00205 /**
00206   * @brief Enumeration of LCD blink frequency.
00207   */
00208 typedef enum
00209 {
00210   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div8    = (0x00 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 8                          */
00211   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div16   = (0x01 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 16                         */
00212   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div32   = (0x02 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 32                         */
00213   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div64   = (0x03 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 64                         */
00214   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div128  = (0x04 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 128                        */
00215   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div256  = (0x05 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 256                        */
00216   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div512  = (0x06 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 512                        */
00217   LCD_BlinkFrequency_Div1024 = (0x07 << 13), /*!< Blink frequency = frame rate / 1024                       */
00218 } LCD_BlinkFrequency_Enum;
00219 
00220 /**
00221   * @brief Enumeration of LCD charge pump.
00222   */
00223 typedef enum
00224 {
00225   LCD_ChargePump_2V65 = (0x00 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 2.65 V                                     */
00226   LCD_ChargePump_2V75 = (0x01 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 2.75 V                                     */
00227   LCD_ChargePump_2V85 = (0x02 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 2.85 V                                     */
00228   LCD_ChargePump_2V95 = (0x03 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 2.95 V                                     */
00229   LCD_ChargePump_3V10 = (0x04 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 3.10 V                                     */
00230   LCD_ChargePump_3V25 = (0x05 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 3.25 V                                     */
00231   LCD_ChargePump_3V40 = (0x06 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 3.40 V                                     */
00232   LCD_ChargePump_3V55 = (0x07 << 10), /*!< Charge pump voltage = 3.55 V                                     */
00233 } LCD_ChargePump_Enum;
00234 
00235 /**
00236   * @brief Enumeration of LCD dead time.
00237   */
00238 typedef enum
00239 {
00240   LCD_Deadtime_0 = (0x00 << 7), /*!< No dead time                                                           */
00241   LCD_Deadtime_1 = (0x01 << 7), /*!< Type A: 1/2 phase period; Type B: 1 phase period                       */
00242   LCD_Deadtime_2 = (0x02 << 7), /*!< Type A: 2/2 phase period; Type B: 2 phase period                       */
00243   LCD_Deadtime_3 = (0x03 << 7), /*!< Type A: 3/2 phase period; Type B: 3 phase period                       */
00244   LCD_Deadtime_4 = (0x04 << 7), /*!< Type A: 4/2 phase period; Type B: 4 phase period                       */
00245   LCD_Deadtime_5 = (0x05 << 7), /*!< Type A: 5/2 phase period; Type B: 5 phase period                       */
00246   LCD_Deadtime_6 = (0x06 << 7), /*!< Type A: 6/2 phase period; Type B: 6 phase period                       */
00247   LCD_Deadtime_7 = (0x07 << 7), /*!< Type A: 7/2 phase period; Type B: 7 phase period                       */
00248 } LCD_DeadTime_Enum;
00249 
00250 /**
00251   * @brief Enumeration of LCD high drive.
00252   */
00253 typedef enum
00254 {
00255   LCD_HighDrive_0 = (0x00 << 4), /*!< No high drive                                                         */
00256   LCD_HighDrive_1 = (0x01 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 1 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00257   LCD_HighDrive_2 = (0x02 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 2 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00258   LCD_HighDrive_3 = (0x03 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 3 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00259   LCD_HighDrive_4 = (0x04 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 4 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00260   LCD_HighDrive_5 = (0x05 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 5 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00261   LCD_HighDrive_6 = (0x06 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 6 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00262   LCD_HighDrive_7 = (0x07 << 4), /*!< High drive duration = 7 CK_PS pulses                                  */
00263   LCD_HighDrive_Static = (0xff), /*!< Static high drive                                                     */
00264 } LCD_HighDrive_Enum;
00265 
00266 /**
00267  * @brief Definition of LCD Init Structure.
00268  */
00269 typedef struct
00270 {
00271   LCD_Prescaler_Enum LCD_Prescaler;
00272   LCD_Divider_Enum LCD_Divider;
00273   LCD_Duty_Enum LCD_Duty;
00274   LCD_Bias_Enum LCD_Bias;
00275   LCD_Waveform_Enum LCD_Waveform;
00276   LCD_VoltageSource_Enum LCD_VoltageSource;
00277 } LCD_InitTypeDef;

00279   * @}
00280   */
00281 
00282 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00283 /** @defgroup LCD_Exported_Constants LCD exported constants
00284   * @{
00285   */
00286 #define LCD_INT_UDD                          ((u32)0x00000002)
00287 #define LCD_INT_SOF                          ((u32)0x00000001)
00288 
00289 #define IS_LCD_INT(INT)                      ((((INT) & 0xFFFFFFFC) == 0) && ((INT) != 0))
00290 
00291 
00292 #define LCD_FLAG_FCRSF                       ((u32)0x00000020)
00293 #define LCD_FLAG_RDY                         ((u32)0x00000010)
00294 #define LCD_FLAG_UDD                         ((u32)0x00000008)
00295 #define LCD_FLAG_UDR                         ((u32)0x00000004)
00296 #define LCD_FLAG_SOF                         ((u32)0x00000002)
00297 #define LCD_FLAG_ENS                         ((u32)0x00000001)
00298 
00299 #define IS_LCD_FLAG(FLAG)                    (((FLAG) == LCD_FLAG_FCRSF) || \
00300                                               ((FLAG) == LCD_FLAG_RDY)   || \
00301                                               ((FLAG) == LCD_FLAG_UDD)   || \
00302                                               ((FLAG) == LCD_FLAG_UDR)   || \
00303                                               ((FLAG) == LCD_FLAG_SOF)   || \
00304                                               ((FLAG) == LCD_FLAG_ENS))
00305 
00306 
00307 #define LCD_CLR_UDD                          ((u32)0x00000002)
00308 #define LCD_CLR_SOF                          ((u32)0x00000001)
00309 
00310 #define IS_LCD_CLEAR(CLR)                    ((((CLR) & 0xFFFFFFFC) == 0) && ((CLR) != 0))
00311 /**
00312   * @}
00313   */
00314 
00315 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00316 /** @defgroup LCD_Exported_Functions LCD exported functions
00317   * @{
00318   */
00319 
00320 /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00321    Before using the following functions, be sure to confirm LCDENS = 0 by "LCD_GetFlagStatus(LCD_FLAG_ENS);",
00322    otherwise the LCD may display abnormally.
00323      LCD_DriverInit()
00324      LCD_MaskTimeConfig()
00325      LCD_StaticSwitchConfig()
00326      LCD_MuxCOM7Config()
00327      LCD_MuxCOM6Config()
00328      LCD_MuxCOM5Config()
00329      LCD_MuxCOM4Config()
00330      LCD_WaveformConfig()
00331      LCD_BiasConfig()
00332      LCD_DutyConfig()
00333      LCD_VoltageSourceConfig()
00334      LCD_ChargePumpConfig()
00335 */
00336

00338 void LCD_DriverInit(LCD_InitTypeDef* LCD_InitStruct);
00339 
00340 void LCD_MaskTimeConfig(LCD_MaskTime_Enum Sel);
00341 void LCD_HalfRLCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00342 void LCD_StaticSwitchConfig(LCD_StaticSwitch_Enum Sel);

00344 void LCD_MuxCOM6Config(LCD_MUXCOM6_Enum Sel);
00345 void LCD_MuxCOM5Config(LCD_MUXCOM5_Enum Sel);
00346 void LCD_MuxCOM4Config(LCD_MUXCOM4_Enum Sel);
00347 void LCD_WaveformConfig(LCD_Waveform_Enum Sel);
00348 void LCD_BiasConfig(LCD_Bias_Enum Sel);
00349 void LCD_DutyConfig(LCD_Duty_Enum Sel);
00350 void LCD_VoltageSourceConfig(LCD_VoltageSource_Enum Sel);
00351 void LCD_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00352 
00353 void LCD_PrescalerConfig(LCD_Prescaler_Enum Sel);
00354 void LCD_DividerConfig(LCD_Divider_Enum Sel);

00356 void LCD_BlinkFreqConfig(LCD_BlinkFrequency_Enum Sel);
00357 void LCD_ChargePumpConfig(LCD_ChargePump_Enum Sel);
00358 void LCD_DeadTimeConfig(LCD_DeadTime_Enum Sel);
00359 void LCD_HighDriveConfig(LCD_HighDrive_Enum Sel);
00360
